title: First Contact
description: Young Midshipman Ichiro Sato joined the Terran Navy to escape a tyrannical father and find freedom among the stars. He had no idea when he boarded the survey starship Aurora for his first assignment that he and his crew would make humanityâ€™s first contact with a sentient alien species. Little did he know that this fateful encounter would trigger a catastrophic galactic war...
author: Michael R. Hicks
